title: Seriously, please don't ever do or say this.
body:
"It's just normals"

Some people want to win, you can't play bots to grind IP because they give a decent amount less IP.

So people play normals to win IP. It's fine if you want to break the meta A BIT but don't go auto lock whatever you want just cause you can because "fuck it. it's normals"

ESPECIALLY in draft pick. A lot of the players (SUCH AS MYSELF) are thrown into draft pick because of toxic behavior. We have to win a certain amount to get out.

When you act this way and auto lock troll things in a mode that is now designated for toxic players to "reform" you're kinda "baiting" my toxic behavior out. Don't you think? I HAVE to win these. You know that, right?
